subject: Hockey, Ice
Wages and Salaries
Labor and Jobs
Organized Labor
Collective Bargaining
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. Players’ Association offered a three-year deal in which the players would take a reduced share of revenues — though less than the pay cut proposed by owners.
snippet: The N.H.L. Players’ Association offered a three-year deal in which the players would take a reduced share of revenues — though less than the pay cut proposed by owners.
